TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EnvironmentVariableTarget extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定在 set 或 get 作業中要儲存或擷取環境變數的位置。

span.span: Specifies the location where an environment variable is stored or retrieved in a set or get operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的特定多載會使用列舉， ，和方法，以指定的位置或目標位置的名稱和環境變數的值存放或擷取。The enumeration is used by certain overloads of the , , and methods to specify the location, or target, where the name and value of an environment variable is stored or retrieved. 目標可以是三個位置： 目前的處理序、 的 Windows 作業系統登錄機碼保留與目前的使用者相關聯的環境變數或登錄機碼保留環境相關聯的環境區塊與本機電腦上的所有使用者相關聯的變數。The target can be one of three locations: the environment block associated with the current process, the Windows operating system registry key reserved for environment variables associated with the current user, or the registry key reserved for environment variables associated with all users on the local machine. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範列舉方法，建立、 修改和刪除環境變數中的。The following code example demonstrates the enumeration in methods that create, modify, and delete environment variables. [!code-cpp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CS/gsev.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/VB/gsev.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget Machine = int32(2)

summary.span: 此環境變數是從 Windows 作業系統登錄中的 機碼所擷取而來，或是儲存在其中。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the key in the Windows operating system registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者建立的環境變數設定作業中，作業系統會儲存在系統登錄中，但不是在目前的處理序的環境變數。When a user creates the environment variable in a set operation, the operating system stores the environment variable in the system registry, but not in the current process. 如果本機電腦上的任何使用者啟動新的處理序時，作業系統會將環境變數從登錄複製程序中。If any user on the local machine starts a new process, the operating system copies the environment variable from the registry to that process. 當處理序終止時，作業系統就會終結該程序中的環境變數。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process. 不過，登錄中的環境變數會持續發生，直到使用者以程式設計方式或透過作業系統工具將它移除。However, the environment variable in the registry persists until a user removes it programmatically or by means of an operating system tool.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget Process = int32(0)

summary.span: 此環境變數是從與目前處理序有關聯的環境區塊中所擷取而來，或是儲存在其中。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the environment block associated with the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者會在設定作業中建立環境變數。The user creates the environment variable in a set operation. 當處理序終止時，作業系統就會終結該程序中的環境變數。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget User = int32(1)

summary.span: 此環境變數是從 Windows 作業系統登錄中的 機碼所擷取而來，或是儲存在其中。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the key in the Windows operating system registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者建立的環境變數設定作業中，作業系統會儲存在系統登錄中，但不是在目前的處理序的環境變數。When the user creates the environment variable in a set operation, the operating system stores the environment variable in the system registry, but not in the current process. 如果使用者開始新的處理序時，作業系統會將環境變數從登錄複製程序中。If the user starts a new process, the operating system copies the environment variable from the registry to that process. 當處理序終止時，作業系統就會終結該程序中的環境變數。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process. 不過，登錄中的環境變數會保存直到使用者在以程式設計方式或透過作業系統工具移除為止。However, the environment variable in the registry persists until the user removes it programmatically or by means of an operating system tool.
